dict.acceptation: 精神的；心灵的；高尚的，崇高的；宗教的；
圣歌（尤指美国南部黑人的）；教会事物；

sent.orig: You may ask why your local Spiritual Hierarchy is suddenly integrating your physical and spiritual bodies.
sent.trans: 你也许问你的本地灵魂层级为什么突然与你的肉体和灵魂身体成一整体。

sent.orig: Ideal, in fact, should be a spiritual and spiritual sustenance.
sent.trans: 理想，其实应该是一种心灵寄托，精神寄托。

sent.orig: Ecological literature not only provided spiritual resources for the ongoing spiritual revolution alsoinpart of this revolution.
sent.trans: 生态文学为正在进行的精神革命提供了精神资源。

sent.orig: Such skills were not earned through spiritual mastery but are created through spiritual manipulation.
sent.trans: 这类技能并不是由灵性掌握而来，而是由灵性操控而制造。

sent.orig: The spiritual worlds consist of two aspects: emotional state and spiritual home.
sent.trans: 这个精神世界由两个方面构成：情感状态和精神归宿。
